test_results.test_name: Identification and Authentication - Multi-factor Authentication
Regular user accessing user profile should allow access to user profile
Regular user accessing admin panel should deny access to admin panel
Admin user accessing admin panel should allow admin access to admin panel
Regular user accessing resources outside business hours should deny access outside business hours for regular users
File /home/ernesto/Documents/msusel-ssp-manager/logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "access_control"
File /home/ernesto/Documents/msusel-ssp-manager/logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "allow_access"
File /home/ernesto/Documents/msusel-ssp-manager/logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "deny_access"
Account creation with proper approval should allow account creation with proper approval
Account creation without proper approval should deny account creation without proper approval
Account creation by non-admin should deny account creation by non-admin
Account modification with proper authorization should allow account modification with proper authorization
Account modification without proper authorization should deny account modification without proper authorization
Self-modification of non-privileged information should allow self-modification of non-privileged information
Account disabling with proper authorization should allow account disabling with proper authorization
Account disabling without proper authorization should deny account disabling without proper authorization
Account removal with proper authorization should allow account removal with proper authorization
Account removal without proper authorization should deny account removal without proper authorization
Account expiration enforcement should enforce account expiration
Account review should provide account review information
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "account_management"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "account_creation_valid"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "account_modification_valid"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "account_disabling_valid"
File ./logs/opa_interactions.log content is expected to include "account_removal_valid"
Basic audit record content should include all basic required fields
Basic audit record content should have timestamp in ISO 8601 format
Basic audit record content should have a valid event type
Basic audit record content should have a valid outcome
Login event content should have a login entry in the audit log
Login event content should include login-specific fields
Data access event content should have a data access entry in the audit log
Data access event content should include data access-specific fields
Configuration change event content should have a configuration change entry in the audit log
Configuration change event content should include configuration change-specific fields
Failed login event content should have a failed login entry in the audit log
Failed login event content should include reason for failure
OPA validation of audit content should contain audit content validation in OPA logs
Audit failure alert configuration should have alerts enabled
Audit failure alert configuration should have alert recipients configured
Audit failure alert configuration should have appropriate notification methods
Audit failure actions configuration should have actions enabled
Audit failure actions configuration should have appropriate actions configured
Audit failure actions configuration should include system shutdown for critical failures
Audit capacity protection should have capacity protection enabled
Audit capacity protection should have appropriate capacity threshold
Audit capacity protection should have appropriate actions for capacity threshold breaches
Real-time audit monitoring should have real-time monitoring enabled
Real-time audit monitoring should have appropriate monitoring interval
OPA policy validation for audit response should contain audit response validation in OPA logs
System response to audit failure should detect audit failure
System response to audit failure should generate alert for audit failure
System response to audit failure should take appropriate actions for audit failure
System response to critical audit failure should detect critical audit failure
System response to critical audit failure should generate critical alert
System response to critical audit failure should initiate system shutdown or override
Audit review configuration should have review enabled
Audit review configuration should have appropriate review frequency
Audit review configuration should have reviewers configured
Audit review configuration should have automated review enabled
Audit review configuration should have automated tools configured
Audit analysis configuration should have analysis enabled
Audit analysis configuration should have analysis methods configured
Audit analysis configuration should have correlation enabled
Audit analysis configuration should have correlation methods configured
Audit reporting configuration should have reporting enabled
Audit reporting configuration should have appropriate reporting frequency
Audit reporting configuration should have report recipients configured
Risk-based adjustment configuration should have risk-based adjustment enabled
Risk-based adjustment configuration should have risk levels configured
OPA policy validation for audit review should contain audit review validation in OPA logs
Audit findings reporting should have findings available
Audit findings reporting should include required information in findings
Audit review process should complete the review process
Audit review process should analyze audit records
Audit review process should identify findings if applicable
Audit review process should report findings to recipients
Integration with risk assessment should adjust review frequency based on risk
Integration with risk assessment should adjust analysis methods based on risk
Integration with risk assessment should adjust reporting frequency based on risk
Audit storage capacity configuration should have sufficient storage capacity
Audit storage capacity configuration should have monitoring enabled
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate monitoring interval
Audit storage capacity configuration should have alerts configured
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate warning threshold
Audit storage capacity configuration should have appropriate critical threshold
Audit storage capacity configuration should have alert recipients configured
Audit retention policy configuration should have retention policy enabled
Audit retention policy configuration should have appropriate retention period
Audit retention policy configuration should have archiving enabled
Current storage usage should be within acceptable limits
Current storage usage should generate appropriate alerts when approaching capacity
Current storage usage should generate appropriate alerts when at critical capacity
Automatic actions for capacity management should have automatic actions enabled
Automatic actions for capacity management should have at least one action configured
OPA policy validation for audit storage should contain audit storage validation in OPA logs
System response to approaching capacity should detect approaching capacity
System response to approaching capacity should generate warning alert
System response to critical capacity should detect critical capacity
System response to critical capacity should generate critical alert
System response to critical capacity should trigger automatic actions
Login event auditing should include "login" and "test_user" in the audit log
Login event auditing should include required audit fields
Resource access auditing should log data access in the audit log
Resource access auditing should include required fields
Configuration change auditing should log configuration change in the audit log
Configuration change auditing should include all change tracking fields
Failed login auditing should record failed login in the audit log
Failed login auditing should include outcome: failure in audit entry
Failed login auditing should include required fields for failed login
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'audit'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'should_audit'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'audit_record_valid'
OPA interaction log should include audit keywords should contain 'flag_for_review'
Time source configuration should have time source enabled
Time source configuration should have a valid time source type
Time source configuration should have NTP servers configured if using NTP
Time format configuration should use ISO 8601 standard
Time format configuration should have sufficient precision
Time format configuration should use UTC/GMT or have UTC mapping
Time synchronization status should have time synchronization enabled
Time synchronization status should have appropriate synchronization interval
Time synchronization status should have synchronization sources configured
Time synchronization status should have acceptable drift tolerance
Time synchronization status should have recent synchronization
Timestamp validation should have timestamp validation enabled
Timestamp validation should have validation methods configured
Audit record timestamps should have audit records with timestamps
Audit record timestamps should have timestamps in ISO 8601 format
Audit record timestamps should have timestamps with timezone information
Timestamp validation endpoint should validate correct timestamps
Timestamp validation endpoint should reject incorrect timestamps
OPA policy validation for timestamps should contain timestamp validation in OPA logs
